scripts.clean-pwa: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); try { fs.unlinkSync('public/sw.js'); } catch (e) {} try { const files = fs.readdirSync('public').filter(f => f.startsWith('workbox-')); files.forEach(f => fs.unlinkSync('public/'+f)); } catch(e) {}"
